rule: The extracted elements can follow any random order except company names, people names, specific topics, and general themes in sequence.

- People names are separated by commas.
- Specific topics are also a comma-separated list.
- General themes follow the same comma-separated structure.

The output aligns with the structural requirements laid out in the description, adhering to the specified format for each element extracted.
